item.invokablemounts.pig_invoker.hover: Invokes a ghost Pig as a temporary mount. Use while riding to boost.
item.invokablemounts.horse_invoker.hover: Invokes a ghost Horse as a temporary mount.
item.invokablemounts.strider_invoker.hov: Invokes a ghost Strider as a temporary mount. Use while riding to boost.
item.invokablemounts.phantom_invoker.hov: Invokes a ghost Strider as a temporary glider.
item.invokablemounts.ender_dragon_invoke: Invokes a ghost EnderDragon as a temporary mount. Be careful not to suffocate!
item.invokablemounts.soul_stealing_candl: Hold while keeping a mob to get its soul. This basic candle can only capture Pigs and Horses.
item.invokablemounts.otherworldly_soul_s: Hold while keeping a mob to get its soul. This upgraded candle can capture Striders and Phantoms.
